response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its importance, I propose a purchase price of $900,000. This offer is tailored to reflect the product's worth to you while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss this further.", "product_price": 900000}
